dev.b3nedikt.restring

Class Restring

  • dev.b3nedikt.restring.Restring

  • public class Restring

    A Android library to replace string resources dynamically

    • Field Detail

      • INSTANCE

        public static Restring INSTANCE

        A Android library to replace string resources dynamically

    • Method Detail

      • getLocale

        @NotNull
public static java.util.Locale getLocale()

        The Locale currently used by restring, this defaults to Locale.getDefault. If needed the Locale used by restring can be changed anytime.

        See Also:
        Locale, Locale.getDefault, Locale

      • setLocale

        public static void setLocale(@NotNull
                             java.util.Locale value)

        The Locale currently used by restring, this defaults to Locale.getDefault. If needed the Locale used by restring can be changed anytime.

        See Also:
        Locale, Locale.getDefault, Locale

      • getLocaleProvider

        @NotNull
public static LocaleProvider getLocaleProvider()

        The interface LocaleProvider defines the way restring determines its locale, this defaults to the class DefaultLocaleProvider.

        See Also:
        interface LocaleProvider, locale, class DefaultLocaleProvider

      • setLocaleProvider

        public static void setLocaleProvider(@NotNull
                                     LocaleProvider p)

        The interface LocaleProvider defines the way restring determines its locale, this defaults to the class DefaultLocaleProvider.

        See Also:
        interface LocaleProvider, locale, class DefaultLocaleProvider

      • wrapContext

        @JvmStatic
 @NotNull
public static android.content.Context wrapContext(@NotNull
                                                                         android.content.Context base)

        Wraps context of an activity to provide Restring features. Will return the context as it was passed in, if it is already wrapped.

        Parameters:
        base - context of an activity.
        Returns:
        the wrapped context.
